topic.title: iPad Pros in Shanks Hall
topic.shortdesc: iPad Pros are provided to rent out in Shanks Hall classrooms. You may want to use the iPad Pro simply for watching videos or taking notes, or you may want to use the advanced features the iPad Pro has to offer. Follow the instructions in "Technology Rentals" if you are interested in renting an iPad Pro along with your Shanks Hall classroom.

body.p: Here is a list of materials that will come with the iPad Pro rental:
